summary: Provides an analysis pass that inspects a circuit’s directed‑acyclic‑graph representation to determine whether all two‑qubit operations are already placed on qubit pairs that are directly connected in the device’s coupling map (or target). The outcome is stored as a boolean property for downstream passes.
business_intent: Enable transpilation workflows to skip unnecessary routing or swap insertion when a circuit is already compatible with the hardware connectivity, thereby reducing compilation time and circuit depth.
